review: enjoyed the movie. creepy as hell and the characters were relatable, fun and endearing. i cared what happened to them. it's a found footage film and i wouldn't exact call it an original film. it's a mash up of a whole bunch of found footage horror films like the blair witch, and evil dead but i'd still recommend watching it. also check out the movie "6-5=2".
this movie was so chilling! i always enjoy a horror flick but an indian one is rare to find. this movie was beyond my expectations,  so much can go wrong on a trip, i got my lesson for sure!
